title: The Sportsman
description: (10,860 word)A collection of 5 short stories Overtime - A hockey story that crosses the generations. The early morning fog is the perfect place for the ghosts of yesterday to pass on the old skills to the kids of tomorrow.Gully's Legend - A golfer challenges the course record, only to find more obstacles than just fairways and greens. But who's going to survive?The Jumping Buck - Hunting the mystery of a giant, following the trail of death and courage that creates the legend. Based on a real statue.Woody - An oldtimer hits the ice, getting down and dirty one more time.The Tree - A wilderness trip that doesn't end. How do you survive when the forest has a mind of it's own.
author: Rejean Giguere
